item.description: […] written about being a geek parent before — specifically, about how my daughter’s experience of Star Wars differs from mine, and […]

item.title: By: Tracy Townsend
item.dc:creator: Tracy Townsend
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/on-passing-the-torch-or-you-cant-make-them-love-things-the-way-you-do/#comment-1423">Jean Asselin</a>.
You're very welcome!

item.title: By: Jean Asselin
item.dc:creator: Jean Asselin
item.description: That was amazing to read. Thanks for sharing this lovely episode, Tracy!
item.content:encoded: That was amazing to read. Thanks for sharing this lovely episode, Tracy!
